sentences.en: B : OK. The restroom is out in the hallway to your left.
sentences.cn: 没问题,洗手间就在外面走廊的左边.

sentences.en: Can I go to the restroom?
Diarrhea and vomiting made me stay in restroom all night.
sentences.cn: 上吐下泻使我在厕所内待了一整夜.

sentences.en: Do not hard, waste and so on towel loses in the restroom.
sentences.cn: 不要把硬物, 毛巾等废物丢在厕所内.

sentences.en: Ellis lies dead on the floor of the restroom.
sentences.cn: 埃利斯的尸体躺在卫生间的地板上.

sentences.en: I can hear him in the restroom , heaving his heart up.
sentences.cn: 我听得见他在洗手间吐得很厉害.

sentences.en: I go to restroom more than five times a day.
sentences.cn: 我一天上厕所五次以上.

sentences.en: In a hurry to get back to campus for a college class, he instead visited a restroom after spending hours in line and left without as much as a souvenir.
sentences.cn: 在排队苦苦等候了几个小时之后，他才进入公园，去了一趟公共厕所，就急急忙忙的赶回大学校园去上课。 他走时甚至连一件像样的纪念品都没买。

sentences.en: It tells people things like wheRe the RestRoom is.
sentences.cn: 它能告诉人们比如休息室在哪这样的事情.

sentences.en: Oh, can you tell me where the restroom is?
sentences.cn: 哦, 能不能告诉我洗手间在哪里?

sentences.en: The bus is equipped with a restroom for your convenience.
sentences.cn: 为了您的方便,车上备有洗手间.

sentences.en: The restroom is at the end of the hallway to the right.
sentences.cn: 洗手间在走廊尽头右转的地方.

sentences.en: There are a lot of webs in the restroom.
sentences.cn: 这间厕所有很多蜘蛛网.

sentences.en: Well, can you tell me where the restroom is?
sentences.cn: 嗯, 你能告诉我盥洗室在哪儿 吗 ?

sentences.en: Where is the Restroom? Thank you very much!
sentences.cn: 请问洗手间在哪儿? 谢谢!

sentences.en: Where is the washroom ( restroom, elevator )?
sentences.cn: 请问盥洗室 ( 休息室 、 电梯 ) 在哪儿?

words.tran_cn: 厕所；洗手间；休息室；更衣室

trans.tran_en: In a restaurant, theatre, or other public place, a restroom is a room with a toilet for customers to use
